title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.2 - Establishment of private rail crossings; prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.2 - Establishment of private rail crossings; prohibitions

State Regulations

No new private rail crossings shall be established in an
intercity rail passenger service corridor unless an application has been made
to and approved by the Commissioner. For purposes of this section, new private
rail crossing shall mean a private rail crossing established on or after July
26, 1994. Notes

919.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
